Class

Class Ordering

  • java.lang.Object
    • Class.Ordering
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenerateId, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Delivery

    public class Ordering
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, GenerateId
    This is the Ordering class Any functions related to ordering at the restaurant (Adding, updating and removing an order) will happen here It implements serializable to allow us to serialize and deserialize to a file (After oder is paid for) It also implements the Generate Id interface to be able to generate a random id for the integer
    Since:
    2019/04/01
    Version:
    9.0
    Author:
    Muhammad Hisyam bin Jukifli and Munirah Mohd
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        orderID, - This ordering's Order ID
        tableID, - This ordering's Table ID
        employeeID, - This orderings's Staff ID
        menuList, - This ordering's selected menu
        status, - This orderings's order status
        date, - This ordering's order date
        totalPrice, - This ordering's price
        token, - This ordering's token

        Parameters:
        mainmenu - (The customer's current food selection)
        orderList - (The array that contain all unpaid orders)
        ind - (The index of the Table ID in the orderList array)
        ch - (The choice made in the Main Menu Selection)
        Returns:
        (The updated Ordering's order object)
